column5: The Designer Collection is one of our premium ranges. This is hand tufted and hand carved by premium craftsmen. This range features modern designs in the latest colours. The designs are highlighted with viscose to give that luxurious look and feel.
column6: Wool and viscose; tufted and hand carved
column7: Every one is unique; naturally resilient; dense pile; hard wearing; long life; easy to clean
column8: This quality can be replicated into your very own designs; sizes and colours in our 'Me project' for custom made rugs. Design yourself your very own rug with 'ME'.
column13: Regular vacuuming required. Professional cleaning recommended. Any spills should be blotted up immediately. Do not pull at fibres. Keep out of direct sunlight. Shedding is a natural feature of spun products (wool; viscose). Do not use power head vacuum.
